item.title: Jekyll설치 가이드
item.description: install jekyll install ruby2.3 ubuntu sudo apt-add-repository ppa:brightbox/ruby-ng sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install ruby2.3 ruby2.3-dev install gem sudo apt-get install gem update gem sudo gem install rubygems-update install Jekyll sudo gem install jekyll check jekyll version jekyll --version
